channel.title: LostPkz is back!
channel.description:
[B][SIZE=5]Welcome to Lost-Pkz a RuneScape private server. We plan to be as different from other servers as much as possible. You may know Lost-Pkz from years ago, well it died. We plan to bring it back and have all the Lost-Pkz fans and members to begin playing again and have good old times. We will be dedicated like the old Lost-Pkz and have regular updates.. We decided to shake things up a bit with a new name and such! Let's get this going again![/SIZE][/B]
[SIZE=4][B]We will have many quests and unique features so it dosen't get old and boring like every server you see these days! We are putting a server up now for you to play while we update.
We plan on giving Lost-Pkz an old school feeling/look with newschool in it so not like a remake nor is it a 562 wannabe, just 474 looking and great economy!
Play Now: www.lost-pkz.org Forums: www.lost-pkz.org
[B][U]NEED STAFF[/U][/B]
VIDEOS - (THOUSANDS OF VIEWS) [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J6R5eCSrrsQ[/youtube] [youtube][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=faZOPl_DNTo]LostPkz Private Server Review - YouTube[/url][/youtube] [youtube][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vtGLknBnjdg]G3t Mon3ys Pk Video (LostPkz) - YouTube[/url][/youtube] [youtube][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I6faXA-zBqM][Lostpkz] I Brutal I Pk Vid One / Redemption - YouTube[/url][/youtube]
-Full 1V1(Teaming impossible) -WORKING FOLLOW!(NPC's, Players, Attacking follow) -FULL Fight pits -100% Jad Waves, switch prayers, healers, etc. -Working auto retalliate -FULL Pest control! -Working veng (retaliate & red skull) -GS/Godsword specs like RS. -Forums - Lostpkz-forums.org -Working FULL void effect, rune cbow does random d fire, all barrows sets do their effect, almost every useful RS item. -Anti crashers, nulls, polygomy, SYI etc. -Most working RS bonuses -Mage bonuses, def bonuses attack bonuses actually matter, not just strength. -Good timers & Pking. -Working barrows, 10 kills then click the chest. -Full 1v1 -Teaming zones as well. -Already working economy -We ARE a dedicated server. (24/7 no lag) - Fully working godwars (use tookuls) ----- There are no commands or starter except :: players
all teleports work normal/ancients/ and lunar. Features: -Godwars -Bandos & Armadyl -Vesta's & Statius -Active admins & mods -Social players -Working specs -Dragon Claws -Unique Systems -Quests -And much more...

item.title: LostPkz is back!
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

item.title: LostPkz is back!
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Forever Mr. Forever
item.description:
@Mr_Forever wrote:

[SIZE=5]Welcome to Lost-Pkz a RuneScape private server. We plan to be as different from other servers as much as possible. You may know Lost-Pkz from years ago, well it died. We plan to bring it back and have all the Lost-Pkz fans and members to begin playing again and have good old times. We will be dedicated like the old Lost-Pkz and have regular updates… We decided to shake things up a bit with a new name and such! Let’s get this going again![/SIZE]

[SIZE=4][B]We will have many quests and unique features so it dosen’t get old and boring like every server you see these days! We are putting a server up now for you to play while we update.

We plan on giving Lost-Pkz an old school feeling/look with newschool in it so not like a remake nor is it a 562 wannabe, just 474 looking and great economy!

Play Now: www.lost-pkz.org
Forums: www.lost-pkz.org

NEED STAFF

VIDEOS -
(THOUSANDS OF VIEWS)
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J6R5eCSrrsQ[/youtube]
[youtube]LostPkz Private Server Review - YouTube[/youtube]
[youtube]G3t Mon3ys Pk Video (LostPkz) - YouTube[/youtube]
[youtube][Lostpkz] I Brutal I Pk Vid One / Redemption - YouTube[/youtube]

-Full 1V1(Teaming impossible)
-WORKING FOLLOW!(NPC’s, Players, Attacking follow)
-FULL Fight pits
-100% Jad Waves, switch prayers, healers, etc.
-Working auto retalliate
-FULL Pest control!
-Working veng (retaliate & red skull)
-GS/Godsword specs like RS.
-Forums - Lostpkz-forums.org
-Working FULL void effect, rune cbow does random d fire, all barrows sets do their effect, almost every useful RS item.
-Anti crashers, nulls, polygomy, SYI etc.
-Most working RS bonuses
-Mage bonuses, def bonuses attack bonuses actually matter, not just strength.
-Good timers & Pking.
-Working barrows, 10 kills then click the chest.
-Full 1v1
-Teaming zones as well.
-Already working economy
-We ARE a dedicated server. (24/7 no lag)

  • Fully working godwars (use tookuls)

There are no commands or starter except :: players

all teleports work normal/ancients/ and lunar.
Features:
-Godwars
-Bandos & Armadyl
-Vesta’s & Statius
-Active admins & mods
-Social players
-Working specs
-Dragon Claws
-Unique Systems
-Quests
-And much more…
